DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effect of tolterodine ER in conjunction with behavioral intervention on subject satisfaction in OAB subjects who were dissatisfied with their most recent antimuscarinic OAB medication therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Effect Of Detrol LA With Behavioral Intervention In Overactive Bladder Subjects Dissatisfied With Recent OAB Medication.
DOC.criteria: Male and female subjects greater than or equal to 18 years of age Overactive bladder symptoms for at least 3 months Previously treated with antimuscarinic OAB medications Participation in any professionally coached sessions (RN, NP, PA or PT) teaching behavioral interventions
